caption.p: Pathological examination. (A) ×100 and (B) ×400. Hematoxylin and eosin staining shows a large number of small, round malignant cells. Immunohistochemical staining for (C) creatine kinase (CK), (D) Friend leukemia virus integration 1 (FLI-1), (E) neuron-specific enolase (NSE), (F) CD99, (G) anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK), and (H) KI-67.
